metadata.name: The African Wanderer
metadata.description: In the Northern part of Nigeria, there are humans who live their daily lives as wanderers; they choose being a traveler than settling in a particular community, some of those are nomads or drifter. Amongst the drifter are those who promotes and ensure passing their cultural heritage to different communities even in their business life. In this picture is a horse rider who moves from different part of the Northern Nigeria to attend cultural events which promotes the horse riding skills to different community which would later become a lifestyle of the people in that community.
